name: the Christmas Loading
description:
Together we wait for Christmas.

Even though it feels like it just happened yesterday, we are already longing for that day with plenty of surprises and happiness.

This is the combination of art and technology in the form of interactive digital art.

It will turn white during the day, black in the evening and sometimes to “sleep mode” at midnight to dawn.

On Christmas Day and New Year’s Eve, it will also change. So let us wait for Christmas and the new year together.
